content: thanks for your post! & for the link to the survey on online harassment. I think we can demand more from the social media platforms we use. Facebook in particular, as Zuckerberg’s vision for the platform has become a ‘normal’ & it doesn’t have to be. In brief, ‘Zuckerberg’s commitment to a consumer focused business model is fundamentally at odds with his stated goal of global connectivity, community, and dialogue. He needs to choose.’ Seems particularly stark given the announcement that FB will create a censored version for China. I wrote about this a couple of days ago — here: https://medium.com/@Sioflynn/mark-zuckerbergs-red-pill-blue-pill-moment-it-affects-all-of-us-bc6382352f0e#.apf9jv78i
